# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly valued by many of our customers. Given its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than $120. Considering its exceptional value, I'm offering it to you for $150. This is an exclusive opportunity to own something truly special at a competitive price. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
